meanings.definition: Items that are already made and ready to use without any additional work or modification.
meanings.sent1: I bought some readymades from the store for my project.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of readymades for quick and easy solutions.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the readymades for my own handmade items!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of readymades transformed her living room into a cozy space.
meanings.sent5: The readymades on display caught the attention of many shoppers.

meanings.definition: Artworks created from everyday objects that are not typically considered art.
meanings.sent1: The artist's readymades were displayed in a modern art gallery.
meanings.sent2: Many people were puzzled by the concept of readymades as art.
meanings.sent3: The readymades in the exhibit made me rethink what art can be.
meanings.sent4: His use of readymades challenged traditional notions of artistic creation.
meanings.sent5: The readymades sparked a lively debate among art enthusiasts.
